Hello! I’m Charlie Bob Gordon,
a digital designer with 11 years
of agency experience.

I’m with over
years of agency
experience

I design websites, mobile applications, user interfaces, printed collateral and presentations all with a user-centric and analytical approach. My designs look pretty but above all they deliver information to the user in the best possible way.

When I’m not working I like creating films, flying my drone, travelling, skiing and taking part in ridiculous endurance challenges.

Let's talk.
hello@cbg.design

I’m always interested in hearing about new projects, so if you’d like to chat please get in touch. If you’d like to see more examples of my work, all you need to do is ask.
